description:
This is a clip from tomorrow's podcast release with Chris Olson. In it, he and Dr. Peterson discuss the growing safety concerns over online crime, AI, and deep fakes.

Dr. Peterson's extensive catalog is available now on DailyWire+: https://bit.ly/3KrWbS8

title: The Incoming Wave of Deep Fakes | Chris Olson
